metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17780 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Telegram Desktop (aka tdesktop) 1.3.14, and Telegram 3.3.0.0 WP8.1 on Windows, leaks end-user public and private IP addresses during a call because of an unsafe default behavior in which P2P connections are accepted from clients outside of the My Contacts list.

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
